meanings.definition: The act of dividing or distributing proportionally.
meanings.sent1: The prorations of the cake were carefully calculated for each guest.
meanings.sent2: She received her prorations of the inheritance after the will was read.
meanings.sent3: The prorations of candy among the kids led to a joyful sugar rush.
meanings.sent4: His prorations of time between work and family were perfectly balanced.
meanings.sent5: The prorations of sunlight through the leaves created a beautiful pattern on the ground.
